name: Ooze
description: Ooze is a stake-able token that mints you a tradable and upgrade-able NFT that is tied to your Ooze stake. You can show up daily to re-compound or withdraw your base 1% interest earned, boost your stake/upgrade your NFT with XP, take out a loan against your NFT, or sell it entirely with your stake and cash out now. How you grow your wealth in Ooze is up to you.
